body.name: Heavy Duty Folding Shopping & Utility Cart, Glides Effortlessly - Easy to Maneuver, Lightweight Push & Pull Behind Cart w/3 Storage Baskets
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 27 mins
features: Heavy Duty but Not Heavy: Solid frame design along with heavy duty materials make this not your average pull behind shopping cart. Strong & sturdy, but with just a gentle push, it effortlessly glides 10 feet. Your entire shopping, laundry, and grocery experience will be a breeze.

Super Quick Folding: This shopping cart is super simple and quick to fold! Weighing 21lbs, this makes the most compact and long-lasting cart that is easy to carry and store in your trunk, house, or apartment - no matter the size (measures 20" x 10.6" x 28.5" when folded with wheels removed). Simply fold both baskets and fully collapse the frame by pulling up the orange side levers for a super compact system.

Triple Storage: Comes with three storage compartments so you can carry it all in one trip! The 20 lbs capacity top storage basket measures 14 x 11.25 x 7.5in and is perfect for holding your more fragile items, while the lower extra large 75lbs capacity basket measures 19 x 17.25 x 12.6in and is designed to carry larger cases and everything else! The 5 lbs capacity tote bag attached to the back conveniently holds two water bottles and has a zippered compartment for valuables.

Front Wheel Suspension: Specially designed for true premium functionality and luxury! The Wadabuggy Shopping cart has 4 rubber foam-filled tires with front wheel suspension. With large 9 1/2 inch rear wheels and smooth swiveling 7 inch front wheels to provide exceptional maneuverability! The wheels are designed with wheel bearings, a short wheel-base frame, and plenty of kick-space easily glides over curbs and other terrain.
Features: Includes premium features and materials like lightweight aluminum that is rust free, a stitched leatherette handlebar grip, and long-lasting 600D luggage fabric.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wadabuggy Shopping Cart If you are tired of lugging your purchased items a few blocks back home, then the Wadabuggy Shop will be a game-changer. The three baskets provide plenty of carrying capacity while you casually stroll along behind. The Wadabuggy Shop has been thoughtfully engineered with heavy duty materials and a solid frame design. Easily maneuver through crowded areas and on uneven terrain. Then, fold it up for easy storage in your house or car. Finally, a shopping cart that glides effortlessly!

Super Compact Fold Lightweight and easy to carry, plus has a super compact fold for easier storage! Remove the wheels & use the rubber safety strap for a secure fold. Easy to Use Brakes Features a one-foot brake and release pedal to make stopping and going easier Cup Holders Our zipper tote bag is designed to hold two water bottles so you can be totally hands free Extra Storage Take the load off with the Wadabuggy shop, designed with three storage baskets to fit all your necessities

Wadabuggy Carts Wadabuggy Shop Wadabuggy Pet Wadabuggy Beach Super Compact & Quick Folding Compact & easy to carry. Measures 20"x10.6"x28.5" when folded w/ wheels removed Smooth Ride Easy maneuverability & front wheel suspension for a smooth ride Features Water bottle holder, Umbrella holder, and Chair Rack Easy To Maneuver Designed for premium functionality & luxury with front wheel suspension 20lb Capacity For small dogs or cats, designed with a canopy for shade Easy To Maneuver Rubber filled wheels made to float on sand, making this cart easy to push Extra Storage 20lb capacity top storage & 75lb bottom storage for larger items Extra Storage 75lb capacity bottom basket for extra storage for your belongings Extra Storage Extra Large 3.08 cubic feet basket to hold all your beach necessities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product and well designed.
reviews.reviewText: This cart is well designed and folds easily. The wheels can be taken off in seconds to make it even easier to place in the car. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny! 5 stars!
reviews.reviewText: Wadabuggy! Perfect name for the perfect cart!5 stars for sure!By far the best purchase I’ve made in a long time. Super easy to “put together” no actual assembly required, just snap the basket in place. It is light weight but very sturdy, locks in place, but also folds up easy to fit in trunk of car with no problem. We have tried so many carts over the years that haven’t held up or were too hard or heavy to use. This is it for us. We travel a lot and Max just had surgery, he rides easy in the top basket with our heavy load on the bottom. This thing is even shock absorbent! I can’t wait for festival season and camping trips. This will make our everyday grocery and shopping trips so much more convenient. This is our new go to cart. Completely worth it!￼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this while traveling, it make carrying items for car to hotel a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves her waddabuggy more than she loves me. She dreams up missions so she can take it around town. People comment on it and even take pix of it. No kidding, this is a wonderful product and if you can afford it you should get one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome cart but don't lean on it
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with quality of this product (expected at this price point, though): no assembly effort needed, nice clip-on wheels, adjustable bar etc. It's like a high end stroller but is not mistaken to be a stroller. It's a game changer for us in New York City. People are already taking pictures of it!But, unfortunately, it suffers from a design problem that could easily be avoided. Specifically when empty, front wheels come off the ground with a tiny downward push to the bar. This can be dangerously unstable if you need to lean on it, and therefore not a good product for senior people who might need to lean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new go to shopping cart
reviews.reviewText: I just received my cart and I love it. It’s my new go to shopping cart. It’s light weight and smooth. I really like it well-made. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cart for shoppers
reviews.reviewText: Transporting groceries.......such a waste of money...it's a a stroller. I'm 75 years old and need a way to get my groceries from my car to the house. I can't afford to send it back or order something different. I'm so disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: This is so well made and omg I’m so excited to use it
